description: Try our easy to follow Jungle Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Jungle Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble the jungle cake: Sandwich the two marble buttercakes together, using about 1/4 of the dark chocolate ganache. Place the whole cake onto a cake plate. Spread remaining dark chocolate ganache over top and side of cake. Remove the chocolate tree decorations from the baking paper and arrange around cake, pressing into ganache to hold. Arrange remaining caramel bits around base of the cake. Roughly spread dollops of both pale and dark green-tinted white ganache over top of cake to make tree canopy. Add sweets and jungle animal toys as shown.

Arrange remaining caramel bits around base of the cake. Roughly spread dollops of both pale and dark green-tinted white ganache over top of cake to make tree canopy. Add sweets and jungle animal toys as shown.
